comments.en:
Prints 10mm per second.

Consumables/Refills: Black on White Thermal Paper Fabric Tape Blue on White Flexi Tape Iron on Black Tape Security Tape Black on White Strong Adhesive Tape TZ tape widths w: 1=6mm, 2=9mm, 3=12mm, 4=18mm, 5=24mm TZ foreground colours f: 1=black, 2=red, 3=blue, 4=gold, 5=white, TZ background colours b: 1=clear, 2=white, 3=black, 4=red, 5=blue, 6=yellow, 7=green, 8=gold Part numbers: ALK251, TZFAw, TZFXbwf, TZIYwf, TZSEw, TZSbwf
